code: import*as React from'react';import{DailySummary}from'../DailySummary';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{stats}=_ref;const priorityTasks=[{id:'1',title:'Q1 Report Review',description:'Review requested for Q1 financial report with focus on sales projections',urgent:true,platform:'WhatsApp'},{id:'2',title:'Team Meeting Schedule',description:'Team meeting scheduled for tomorrow',urgent:true,platform:'Slack'},{id:'3',title:'Project Timeline Review',description:'Updated project timeline ready for review',urgent:true,platform:'Email'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DailySummary,{stats:stats}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"dashboard-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section-icon",children:"\uD83C\uDFAF"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Priority Tasks"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tasks-list",children:priorityTasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"task-description",children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"platform-badge","data-platform":task.platform,children:task.platform}),task.urgent&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"urgent-badge",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"urgent",children:"\u26A0\uFE0F"}),"Urgent"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"task-action",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"view",children:"\uD83D\uDC49"})})]},task.id))})]})]});};
